patthana23.43:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.43:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.43:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana23.43:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
